I am a professional graphic designer and thought that maybe I could brush up on my Illustrator skills and maybe also learn a few new tricks. I did learn more about the tools in Adobe Illustrator but it was not done easily with this course.
 
On occasion the instructor would call a tool by the wrong name. At times he would attempt to create an effect on an image and it wouldn't work. 

I lost track of how many lessons I had to eventually resort to using another source like Adobe help or other websites. And that was even after I found his transcripts! 

The fact that some of the lessons could only be done on a Mac (and I have a PC) is ridiculous. That's something every instructor should consider before putting a course together. 

At least, unlike my high school daughter's computer science teacher, he did not turn on Infinity Wars while he was expecting us to go on to do the lesson without him.

It could be better to give more ideas on some specific topics like website design and UI/UX design too. Some theory part is also required to make a full fledged package that can make someone to earn from freelancing websites with confidence.

I recently completed an Adobe Illustrator course that left an indelible impression on me. The experience was nothing short of exceptional, offering an unparalleled opportunity to acquire invaluable skills and knowledge in this industry-leading design software. From start to finish, the course surpassed my expectations, equipping me with the tools to fully harness the creative potential of Adobe Illustrator.

The course content was meticulously curated to cater to both beginners and intermediate-level learners. It covered a wide array of topics, ranging from vector graphics and drawing tools to typography and advanced techniques. The material was presented in a coherent and engaging manner, ensuring a seamless learning journey. The instructor, a true master of Adobe Illustrator, skillfully guided us through each concept, offering lucid explanations and practical examples. Their passion for teaching was palpable, creating an immersive learning environment that fostered growth and exploration.

One notable aspect of the course was its emphasis on practical application. Through hands-on exercises and real-world projects, I was able to apply my newfound knowledge and develop proficiency in various design tasks. From designing captivating logos to creating intricate illustrations, each project challenged me to push my boundaries and refine my skills. The combination of theoretical knowledge and practical experience was instrumental in building confidence and competence in using Adobe Illustrator effectively.

The course also provided an array of supplementary resources, including tutorial videos, downloadable assets, and reference materials. These resources proved invaluable in reinforcing my learning and allowed me to delve deeper into specific areas of interest. Additionally, the inclusion of an online community and discussion forums facilitated collaboration, providing a platform to connect with fellow learners and seek guidance from experienced professionals.

In summary, the Adobe Illustrator course I undertook was an extraordinary experience that propelled my creative journey to new heights. The well-structured curriculum, expert instruction, practical projects, and abundant supplementary resources were all instrumental in enhancing my proficiency in Adobe Illustrator. I wholeheartedly recommend this course to anyone seeking to unlock their creative potential and master the art of design using Adobe Illustrator. It is a worthwhile investment that will undoubtedly yield significant professional growth and unleash your creativity in unimaginable ways.
